entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nakusp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nakusp 1:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %

Wind: WSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level 900 metres. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
